temperatureDescription: Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more creative, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
Reset Confirmation Message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This action cannot be undone.
Storage almost full: Storage almost full! Consider clearing old conversations.
Local storage info: All data is stored locally in your browser's localStorage and remains entirely on your device.
